forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow this evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this evening will become intermittent overnight. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday
